lines.text: How'd it go? How'd you expect it would go with me handlin' the deal? Those redskins wiped out that whole trading post!
That makes three. Let's see, there's two more to go. Why Matt Carter won't have a dollar to his name inside of a month!
That's a right nice horse there, ain't it.
It sure is! I wonder who he belongs to.
Well, he belongs to Buckshot Thomas.
Buckshot Thomas, eh? I don't think I know the gentleman.
